entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
